task.title: Inline DM conversation with agent invites

events.content: Reintroduce DM participants inline: Reintroduce DM participants inline

raw.question: Reintroduce DM participants inline
raw.reasoning: Inline DM view now supports inviting/removing agents with toggles, filters messages to human+participants, and sends to human plus invited agents

retrospective.summary: DMs now inline: human channel shows agent toggles, filters messages to participants, and sends to human + invited agents
